pullRequest.title: Added health endpoint
pullRequest.bodyText: #392 - added health endpoint for primary storage, it returns OK status if check passed and BAD_REQUEST (it seems to be the standard error for health check errors), and JSON array response with verbose statuses for each check (only storage for now).

nodes.bodyText: @g4s8 I am not sure if you are adapting to some existing health check protocol, but it does not look good to respond with 4xx client error response. I think some 5xx server error is more appropriate, maybe 503 Service Unavailable will make more sense?
